sakai:title: Group Join Requests - List.
sakai:shortDescription: List all of the pending join requests for the group specified by the groupId parameter
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "groupId", "description" : "Specify the group for which you want join requests."}
sakai:description: This search will get all the pending join requests for the group specified by the groupId parameter.
sakai:response:
Standard request.
Example: Request to: /var/joinrequests/list.json
